it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class RoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.RoundManager

  • class RoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is at a lower level than GameManager It handles the operations and the logic relating to the round phase

      • activateToolcard

        boolean activateToolcard(java.lang.String username,
                         int toolCardId)
        Activate one of the 3 toolcards. Checks if it's possible to use the toolcard and if the player has enough tokens. Increase the cost of the toolcard if activated.
        Parameters:
        username - of the player
        toolCardId - index of toolcard selected
        Returns:
        true if successfully activated

        Returns:

      • passTurn

        boolean passTurn(java.lang.String username)
        Pass the current player's turn to the next one of the queue. Checks if it's possible to pass the turn. Checks if the round if finished.
        Parameters:
        username - of the player
        Returns:
        true if successfully passed the turn

      • undo

        Undo the current operation
        Parameters:
        username - of the current player
        Returns:
        true if the state is not YOUR_TURN, false otherwise
